com.spotify.flo.util

Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spotify.flo.util.Date
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Date>

    public abstract class Date
extends Object
implements Comparable<Date>, Serializable
    A value type representing a date. e.g. 1995-04-10, 2016-10-20, This type can be used for flo task arguments. It is compatible with the generated command line parser from flo-cli by implementing valueOf(String).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
